long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I found, that I search information on the web a lot, so many tabs of Google pages stay opened. And I'm lazy to close them all one by one.

Usually, I need keep them opened until I found exact page I needed. But after that I don't even return to Google results and these tabs stay opened until I remember that.
Moreover, I start typing new search query on last opened tab even when previous tab was a Google tab.

You can also try https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/close-all-tabs/jcokdfogijmigonkhckmhldgofjmfdak?hl=en - btw, good extension!

But I prefer to see the logo of the page I want to close and I just wrote it - I know what actually it does.

Bonus: This extension supports suspended pages by following extension: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/the-great-suspender-notra/ahkbmjhfoplmfkpncgoedjgkajkehcgo
